content.query:
-- Stap 4: Voer de COPY INTO-opdracht uit om gegevens van de externe opslag naar de interne tabel te kopiÃ«ren
COPY INTO dbo.InternalBooksTable
(
    Title,
    Description,
    Authors,
    Image,
    PreviewLink,
    Publisher,
    PublishedDate,
    InfoLink,
    Categories,
    RatingsCount
)
FROM 'https://storagelaas.dfs.core.windows.net/boeken/books_data.csv'
WITH  
(
   FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
   FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
   ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
   FIELDQUOTE = '"',
   ENCODING = 'UTF8',
   FIRSTROW = 2,
   MAXERRORS = 10
);
